author: wn.com
title: 20 October 15 - Next round of agricultural vehicle workshops to come to the Lothians, ...
text: ( Source : National Farmers' Union of Scotland ) Article date: 20 October 2015 NFU Scotland is taking to the road once again to hold workshops focused on agricultural and vehicle transportation issues. This is the latest round of workshops
